messages.message: Does the crafting-cyp env use the same configuration as crafting backend dev template? The context behind this is I'm getting the same error when setting up UDFs on our crafting env as on crafting-cyp. however, on sandboxes like uat, prod, etc, creating udfs works correctly so i'm guessing it's due to us not setting the aws keys correctly in env-local-overrides (ref (https://drive.google.com/a/instabase.com/open?id=1YA1mqwNzrxFUN2m1hLT3-IooyJ6lPvShug76mL6A2Pg)).

No. Crafting-cyp env uses `cypress-ci` crafting template. It only deploys webpack (frontend) based on the code changed in the PR. All API requests go to the shared ICC sandbox (https://sandbox.console.instabase.com/customer/Engineering/tenant/crafting-cyp/info). So, likely, you need to change the env vars in that linked ICC sandbox.
`env-local-overrides` only applies when running services locally and they are not used in deployed envs
